alert.note: Alert for Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 5:18PM CDT until April 23 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WESTERN UNION...EASTERN ADAMS...NORTHWESTERN RINGGOLD...NORTHERN TAYLOR AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 518 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Corning to 7 miles west of Lenox to near Bedford, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Creston, Corning, Lenox, Green Valley Lake, Orient, Clearfield, Diagonal, Prescott, Gravity, Cromwell, Sharpsburg, Kent, Conway, Lake Of Three Fires State Park, Creston Municipal Airport, Green Valley Lake State Park and Corning Municipal Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
